subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This plugin let display one or more Kibana dashboards on a portal front end page or into the back office. It will automatically search for Kibana dashboard into a given Elastic Search server and displays each one in a tab.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: URLs of the Kibana and the ElasticSearch servers should be defined into the kibana.properties file as below.

p.pre:
# URL of the nodejs Kibana4+ server kibana.kibana_server_url=http://localhost:5601
# URL of dashboards list stored by Elastic kibana.elastic.dashboard_query_url=http://localhost:9200/.kibana/dashboard/_search?
